transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji sir, namaste IndiaMART se bol rahi hu, kya naam hai aapka?
Customer: Mera naam [inaudible] hai.
Executive: Ji, kya madad kar sakti hu main aapki?
Customer: Maine kaha tha ki maine jo payment kiya tha, uska refund kab tak aayega?
Executive: Sir, main aapko detail check karke batati hu, ek minute line par bane rahiye.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir, aapka refund process ho gaya hai, aapko 7 se 10 working days mein aapko refund mil jayega.
Customer: Kitne din mein?
Executive: 7 se 10 working days mein sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Aur koi madad kar sakti hu main aapki?
Customer: Nahi, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir, dhanyavad.
Customer: Dhanyavad.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer enquired about refund of payment.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed refund is processed.

- Informed it will take 7-10 working days.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, payment
